channel.title: myphoneexplorer on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu
channel.description: Recent content in myphoneexplorer on Aashiyana of Pamela Santanu

item.title: SMS received
item.description: As I said before I went to hospital on d-day with my Laptop and all cables needed for announcing the arrival of Aarush. Few starring eyes caught me in action when I did fired-up SMS from my laptop. There was no way I could have managed sending all SMS(es) by phone only. So, I had to send SMS in batches : one to my professional contacts, other to extended family and rest to Pamela’s contact list.

item.title: New Gadget K790i
item.description: Well I got it. After lots of deliberation I upgraded my choice to K790 from K750. The big difference is price and features to say in simple words. I heard in recent time James Bond used this same phone in his last movie. Not sure what all other accessories Mr.Q added for him on the film. I wanted to buy a camera phone as that will be handy to capture events.
